summary: Cart Get Contents Endpoint implementation successfully passed all tests. The endpoint was already fully implemented as part of Task 28's comprehensive cart system, providing complete cart retrieval functionality with session validation, expiry checking, and robust error handling.
key_features_validated: GET /api/cart/:session_id endpoint with proper route definition
Session ID parameter extraction and validation
Session ID format validation (24-character length check)
Comprehensive error handling for invalid sessions and expired carts
Standard API response format with success_response()
Error code consistency (VAL_001, NOT_002, CART_002, CART_003)
Comprehensive logging for cart retrieval operations
Complete documentation with docstrings and parameter descriptions
implementation_notes: Task was already fully implemented in Task 28's comprehensive cart system
Implementation includes session validation and expiry handling
Provides complete cart data including items, totals, and metadata
Uses consistent error codes and response formats
Integrates seamlessly with existing cart model and database operations
Includes comprehensive documentation and error scenario handling
